the end of 2021, we started a good tradition - to gather across 14+ countries in one virtual room and discuss where we are.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The first global all-hands meeting was successful and so inspiring for our colleagues that’s why we committed to meet each other regularly. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In 2022, at the Danone All-hands meeting, our colleagues from 25 countries across the world were invited.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"See you soon at our next Danone All-Hands
